name: monster mash (itch) (pancelor, princryss)
description:
you've received a mysterious invitation to a party. but it's not just any party...

it's the 💀monster mash💀

better find somebody to go with!

Controls:
- arrow keys to move
- x to interact
- z to jump

Credits:
- design by: cryss (and pancelor)
- art by: cryss (and pancelor)
- code by: pancelor (and cryss)
- music by: cryss
- sound by: cryss (and pancelor)
- engine: pico-8
